column4: Hey guys. I removed the sound icon from one of my panels and I can't figureo ut how to add it back on. I know this seems silly and trivial, but it's not in the list of applets. :(
should just be a matter of right clicking on the panel and selecting it1?
Yeah it's not in the applet list, is my problem. :
was it there by default? I don't have a sound effort on any of my panels?
